product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Vegetarian Bacon and Cheddar Mashed Potatoes - 2 Servings
long_description: Satisfy your hunger with a hearty helping of Backpacker's Pantry Vegetarian Bacon and Cheddar mashed potatoes. Includes mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese and vegetarian bacon bits. To prepare, add 1 cup of boiling water, stir and let sit for 13 min.; stir and serve. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Satisfy your hunger with a hearty helping of Backpacker's Pantry Vegetarian Bacon and Cheddar mashed potatoes.
